disabled.description: If true, the tab will be disabled.

id.description: The id of the tab. If not provided, it will be automatically generated.

onClick.description: Callback fired when the tab is clicked.

rootRef.description: Ref to the root slot's DOM element.

value.description: The value of the tab. It's used to associate the tab with a tab panel(s) with the same value. If the value is not provided, it falls back to the position index.

getRootProps.description: Resolver for the root slot's props.

index.description: 0-based index of the tab in the list of tabs.

rootRef.description: Ref to the root slot's DOM element.

totalTabsCount.description: Total number of tabs in the nearest parent TabsList. This can be used to determine if the tab is the last one to style it accordingly.
